entry.title: AdamosDA/drupal256
entry.summary:
Linux ncurses/bash console app for tiny Drupal/Wordpress Cloud instances, featuring APACHE, SSL, PHP, MYSQL, EXIM, MUNIN automated administration

drupal256

Linux ncurses/bash console app for the deployment of Drupal/Wordpress Cloud instances, featuring:

  • Virtual hosting
  • APACHE web server
  • SSL self-signed certificates
  • PHP scripting language
  • MYSQL database
  • EXIM MTA
  • MUNIN networked resource monitoring tool
